jobDescription: Internship Description: We are looking for enthusiastic software developer interns for our Human Effectiveness, Socio-Cognitive Systems, Sensor Processing & Networking, and Decision Management divisions. We are seeking students with an interest in learning about and a successful academic background in the following areas: software engineering, computer science, cognitive engineering, artificial intelligence, or applied mathematics.  You will use a variety of technologies, such as cognitive modeling, graphical user interface (GUI) development, natural language processing, machine learning, probabilistic reasoning, data fusion, and planning and optimization. You will work in small project-oriented groups of scientists and software engineers to build working prototypes of intelligent decision-support tools.
